listing.listing_description:
Settle into the Koh Samui landscape—and lifestyle—at Samujana Eight. Tucked into a rocky outcrop on a hill overlooking Plai Laem, this sleek vacation rental was designed to blend seamlessly with its gorgeous surroundings. Open-air living spaces, four suite-style bedrooms and luxury amenities mean you’ll have no trouble adjusting to the laid-back way of island life.

Your holiday at the Samujana estate includes an airport transfer, breakfast, a complimentary beach shuttle and more. Staff members are happy to assist you in organizing everything from in-villa cooking and fitness classes to excursions and even weddings. Of course, you can also opt to spend your stay by the villa’s infinity pool, which stretches out in front of an ocean-facing terrace with loungers and a barbecue.

The villa’s living spaces feel like part of the terrace, too, thanks to open-sided walls that let in the sunshine and warm breezes. The great room layout offers a sitting area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen in one . Natural stone walls echo the rock outcrops just outside, and sculptural artwork adds an exotic touch.

Each of the four bedrooms at Samujana Eight has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, lounge area and terrace access. Oversized glass doors opening to lush landscaping, understated furnishings and vibrant textiles make each suite a beautiful private haven.

Koh Samui is a destination on the list of everyone from the jet set to backpackers, honeymooners to retired couples. And Samujana makes it easy to explore this enchanting island, with a complimentary shuttle from the estate to family-friendly Choeng Mon Beach and trendy Chaweng Beach, where you can people-watch from the chic oceanfront restaurants or slip your toes into soft white sand. There are several golf courses nearby for avid players, and estate staff can help organize yacht charters, scuba excursions, rum distillery tours and more.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Part of the exclusive Samujana community on the northeast coast of the island of Koh Samui, Samujana Nine is a gorgeous luxury villa with breathtaking views of the Gulf of Thailand and elegant design that melds contemporary comfort with Thai tradition. For families, groups of friends, and destination wedding guests seeking a private home base only minutes from the beaches, golf courses, and rainforests of this Southeast Asian gem, this four-bedroom vacation rental is the ideal choice.

The villa's design invites you to long days and nights of plein air relaxation. The lovely infinite swimming pool gazes out on ocean views and the distant islands of the archipelago, bordered by the pool deck with sumtuous red loungers. The cozy outdoor/indoor lounge is ideal for sipping cocktails together in the sea breeze, while the beautiful wooden alfresco dining table with seating for ten is where you'll savor delicious meals in the sunset light. The fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar looks out on the living area, and a poolside grill is perfect for Asian barbeque. Lovely furnishings of natural materials and tones, gurgling fountains in the lush garden, and touches of Buddhist art and décor engender an ambience of centered and joyful sanctuary.

The villa's interior is ideally designed for relaxation and play. On the bottom floor, the open-plan lounge and game area is absolutely ideal for fun nights together, featuring a sumptuous lounge with flat screen television, a cocktail bar, a private cinema, and a spectacular game area with pool table, ping pong, and even a charming slide.

On the main floor, the villa's bedrooms are perfectly oriented for welcoming the ocean breeze and light, with private terrace access and luminous décor. Three of the bedrooms have king size beds, while the fourth has two twin size beds, and all have ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone showers and large bathtubs.

At Samujana, you're ideally positioned to enjoy nights in downtown Koh Samui and long days exploring the stunning natural beauty of the island. Choeng Mon Beach and Chaweng Beach are both five minutes away, and precious rainforest is within minutes. Two beautiful golf courses are also within easy reach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This stunning luxury villa is part of the exclusive Malaiwana estate in Thalaga, along a secluded and pristine shoreline in northwest Phuket Island. Perched above Nai Thon Beach, Villa Haleana features breathtaking ocean views, superb outdoor and indoor living areas, five deluxe king bedrooms, and outstanding contemporary amenities. For large families, friends, and destination wedding guests seeking exquisite privacy and style in one of the most beautiful regions of Thailand, Villa Haleana is an unparalleled choice.

Situated amid lush tropical gardens, the villa enjoys panoramic views of the Andaman Sea from its terrace and capacious interior. Savor a soak in the eighteen-meter infinite swimming pool, and sip cool drinks on elegant sun loungers. Fire up the grill for a Thai seafood barbeque, and relish it at the lovely, ocean-view table.

Expansive glass walls open to the superb Great Room, creating a seamless space for relaxation, dining, and entertainment. Under high, peaked ceilings, relax together on the sumptuous sectional sofa, enjoying cocktails and beholding the dreamy horizon. Prepare delicious meals in the fully equipped kitchen, gather around the gorgeous dining table for festive feasts, and withdraw into the cozy media lounge. In the morning, refresh your mind and body in the fitness room and spa. Air conditioning, round-the-clock security, and an elevator ensure total convenience and comfort. Spa, and other services are available at extra cost.

All five bedrooms have lush king beds and one with twin beds that is convertible to a double, direct access to exterior living areas, and ocean views. The master suite features a lounge, walk-in closet and dressing area, desk, private balcony, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and tub. The primary guest room also has a walk-in closet and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub. The other guest rooms have ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone showers. In bedrooms three and four, the king beds can be replaced paired twin beds.

Along with exquisite seclusion, Villa Haleana enjoys an excellent location for exploring the island of Phuket. Nai Thon Beach is just steps away, while Layan Beach is ten minutes away on foot. You're also a short drive from Dream Beach Club, Banyan Tree Spa and The Laguna Phuket Golf Club. Phuket International Airport is about eight miles away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The beachfront residences at Jivana Villas will provide you and your guests with luxurious accommodation in a relaxed and exotic beachfront location. This newly developed estate sits on one of Thailand’s most beautiful beaches, boasting a fine array of properties that combine understated styling with all the modern conveniences and facilities that you would only expect from a five star resort. Sunsets are a very special time at Ananda with gorgeous burnt orange and purple colors protruding from the twilight skies. This property is laid out with three individual pavilions, each with pool and ocean views and designed with an overall contemporary Thai style. A fourth pavilion hosts the kitchen, children’s residence and staff quarters.

Careful planning of the layout of Ananda ensures you can immerse yourself in the glorious natural surroundings. More than 80 meters of total beachfront and manicured tropical gardens provide a multitude of places to stretch out and relax, so you can enjoy both the sun’s rays and the gentle sea breezes while chilling-out in the shade of a coconut tree. On either side of the courtyard is the family room, complete with a flat screen LCD television, DVD player and surround system, a library and game table.

The extremely large and well-equipped kitchen is designed to be a creative space for cooking up delights for a small dinner party or catering for a formal event. One of the best things about your vacation here is that the services of a local Thai Chef are included, so all you have to do is sit down and enjoy the banquet.

The great room sits in between two other pavilions, one of which hosts four double bedrooms, the other a master-suite and office, both with garden baths. From all the terraces, guests look out onto the expansive lawn and coconut grove. Each bedroom is served by an en-suite bathroom with an outdoor garden. The owners have decided not to install televisions in the bedrooms, in favor of tranquility.

There are two golf courses and two renowned spas nearby so you can be as active or chilled out as you like when you leave the villa. Phuket International Airport is a mere 30 km drive away so your vacation can begin in earnest after you touch down on Thai soil.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Breathtaking scenery, incredible service and thoughtful details all come together at the stunning Praana Residence. Perched on a hilltop amid verdant rainforests above the crystal-clear Gulf of Samui, this Koh Samui vacation rental boasts service and amenities that rival those of larger five-star properties in the more private setting of the Panacea Retreat Residences. Six suite-style bedrooms mean you can bring family and friends to discover this hidden gem of Thailand luxury.

Your holiday at Praana Residence begins with a complimentary airport transfer and includes the services of a chef, housekeeper, butler and security guard. You’ll be treated to freshly prepared cookies and smoothies throughout your stay, as well as a yoga or massage session and Muay Thai, tennis or cooking lesson on the private outdoor boxing ring and tennis court. Two infinity pools, one of which has a swim-up bar, and a sprawling terrace with a row of lounge chairs provide ample room to soak in the tropical sun, while a pergola-covered outdoor sitting room is a shaded spot to relax. In the evenings, cook at the outdoor kitchen and dine at the al-fresco dining area or step inside to enjoy the home theater, games room or the dance floor in the private nightclub. Kids will love the separate nursery and playroom, while adults will want to indulge in the steam room and sauna.

The villa’s beautifully designed interiors emphasize the surrounding forests and sea with walls of glass covered by traditional peaked roofs. In the great room in the main pavilion, natural-fiber rugs help define the sitting and dining areas in an organic way, and white upholstery and cane-backed chairs create a refined yet casual look. Though your stay includes chef service, the great room also has a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar, so cooks can still be in the middle of the conversation and enjoy the panoramic views.

Each of the villa’s six bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom. There are five bedrooms with king beds, including one master suite with a hot tub, ocean views and a balcony, one with ocean views and a balcony and one that opens directly to the terrace. The sixth bedroom has two twin beds. After a day at a nearby beach or practicing boxing or tennis, the bedrooms’ neutral tones and natural textures are a serene respite.

Book your tickets into Samui Airport, about 9 km from the villa. Once you’ve arrived at Praana Residence, you can explore the nearby Fisherman’s Village, Big Buddha Temple, and town of Chaweng. Stroll along the Nathon or Koh Samui piers, get a closer look at the forests outside your windows in the Koh Samui Rainforest, stay up at the Nathon Night Food Market or meet the locals at the Namuang Safari Park. You’ll also have your choice of beaches for playing in the water or taking a honeymoon-worthy stroll, from Bophut Beach, 3 km away, to Chaweng and Maenam beaches, about 8 km away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Glam Habitat offers gorgeous luxury vacation rentals along the western edge of Phuket within walking distance of Kamala Beach—one of the most serene and enchanting coastlines in all of Thailand. This three-bedroom villa features a private swimming pool, ample roof deck, exquisite alfresco and interior living spaces, and deluxe accommodations for eight, an ideal vacation rental for families and groups of friends. Just a short drive from Phuket International Airport, it's also an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.

The fabulous roof deck enjoys beautiful views of the coastal hills, while the villa's private terrace with swimming pool provides a dreamy setting for relishing the South Pacific sun. Sliding glass doors invite the exquisite air into the home, and allow you to step directly from the living room into the pool's delicious waters.

Indoors, the high windows and beautiful hanging curtains provide a wonderful balance of luminosity and privacy within the open-concept living area. Sip a fine wine in the sumptuous lounge while watching TV. Prepare delicious Thai feasts in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen, and relish them around the elegant dining table. Exquisite furnishings and traditional objets d'art evoke a timeless Thai enchantment within the thoroughly contemporary design. Air conditioning, Wi-Fi, multiple safes, and the villa's excellent staff ensure total comfort and peace of mind.

The villa features three superb king bedrooms, all with ensuite bathrooms featuring stand-alone shower and tub. Each suite enjoys a private balcony, lounge area, safe, desk, and television. The master suite additionally includes a walk-in closet, dressing area, and dual vanity. Furnished and designed with minimalist yet sumptuous elegance, the bedrooms provide individuals and couples with a tranquil and stylish setting for downtime and rest.

Glam Habitat enjoys an extraordinary position on the island Phuket. Just a short walk to the serene Kamala Beach, you're also within minutes of Surin and several other world-class beaches. where you can stroll the white sand at sunset. The area is also a golfer's dream, with Laguna Golf Phuket and Phuket Country Club both within easy reach. Royal Phuket Marina is easily reachable by car.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Set within an exclusive gated community of beachside villas in Phang Nga, Amarelo opens onto a secluded sandy beach. Its impressive size and intelligent layout, wide beachside and back lawns make Amarelo an ideal venue for a family vacation, extravagant private wedding or celebration. You’ll certainly be well looked-after: a daily maid service, Thai chef and full-time security are just some of the benefits of staying here.

Superior minimalist design and contemporary designer furnishings make this villa easy on the eye and effortless to live in. A huge central lounge is flanked by a spacious family room to the left and a fully fitted, brand name western kitchen and bright, glass-walled sea view dining space to the right. A hi-tech lighting and entertainment system allows you to set the mood in each room and stream your own music from a central iPod docking station. The family room is graced by a wall mounted, flat screen television with satellite channels and a DVD player and even has its own pool table.

Acres of glass draw your eye towards the horizon and all the ground floor rooms slide open onto the villa's iridescent 25m saltwater infinity pool and sundeck. Plush sun loungers are poised poolside for days soaking up the tropical sun and the palm-fringed beachside garden also features a spacious covered, al fresco dining area with circular dining table and built-in barbecue. Another furnished beachside relaxation pavilion offers the perfect spot for sunset repose and the wide, lawned gardens at the front and back of the villa create an exceptionally expansive private home.

Three of the six bedrooms can be found on the upper level, while three border the poolside. Two are sea-facing master suites with dramatic views directly from their king-size beds. The guest bedrooms are fitted with twin beds, making them ideal for older children or friends who don’t mind sharing. Two of the poolside bedrooms also share a large bathroom with rainshower and indulgent built-in tub and all the beds have firm, top quality mattresses for restful sleep.

Peace and tranquility are the order of the day at Amarelo and you can do as much or as little as you like. Work out in the on-site fitness room, laze on the beach or ask the staff to arrange a spa treatment or excursion for you. Phuket International Airport is a 30 km drive.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The incredible Koh Samui landscape and thoughtful modern architecture come together to create the stunning Samujana Seven. Built on a hillside overlooking Plai Laem, this luxury vacation rental makes the most of its breathtaking ocean views with open-air living spaces. Relax into the island lifestyle with a resort-worthy pool, beach shuttle and four suite-style bedrooms.

Your holiday on the Samujana estate includes breakfast and airport transfers. Staff members are also happy to assist you in planning in-villa cooking or yoga classes, excursions in the area, and weddings and other events. Your villa includes a private infinity pool and a sunny terrace with plenty of loungers and a barbecue.

Open walls and a serene water feature make the villa’s great room feel like an extension of the terrace. On one side, low-slung sectionals in the sitting area are a shaded alternative to the chaise longues in the sun. On the other, minimalist benches provide plenty of seating without blocking the views in the dining area. A breakfast bar and wine fridge in the fully equipped kitchen invite guests to grab refreshments and mingle.

Each of the four bedrooms at Samujana Seven has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, lounge area and terrace access, so all guests have their own retreat within the house. Large windows and understated furnishings keep the focus on the views from the bedrooms, while an innovative pool on the villa’s roof keeps them naturally cool.

Whether you’re traveling on honeymoon, with friends or as a family, you’ll find plenty to love about lively, lush Koh Samui. Samujana makes it easy to explore the island, with complimentary shuttle service to the soft sands and casual vibe of Choeng Mon Beach, and the trendy restaurants and bustling nightlife of equally sandy Chaweng Beach. Tee off underneath the palms at one of several nearby golf courses, find the perfect souvenir in a local boutique or ask Samujana staff to help arrange a yacht charter, scuba adventure or zipline tour.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Resting on the edge of the immaculate Natai Beach’s shimmering sands, Shanti at Jivana will be your heavenly retreat. This luxuriously peaceful villa in exclusive Phang Nga overlooks the expansive indigo waters of the Andaman Sea. Here, you can lie back on a lounger in the sun untroubled by the outside world. You can slip gracefully in to your exquisite pool and let the cool water soothe you. Or you can simply leave a trail of footprints on your own idyllic strip of beach.

Gaze out from this luxurious villa and all that you will see is the mighty Indian Ocean framed by your inviting pool and exotic coconut groves. Shanti means peace and this glorious setting aims to wrap you in a blanket of tranquility. On arrival you are welcomed by a cascade of sparkling water. This sets the scene for a magnificent 25 meter split-level infinity pool, safe for children and inviting for more experienced swimmers. Next to this you can indulge your taste for both fine cuisine and relaxation in two Sala pavilions dedicated to dining and spa treatments.

Built in luxurious Thai-style, Shanti is divided between three pavilions with an adjacent wing for staff quarters. At its impressive core sits ‘The Great Room’ – a grand combination of living and dining space. Watched over by serene Buddhas, this space is dotted with inviting sofas and chairs laid out for your recreation and repose. Beside them a magnificent dining table will be the focus for delicious meals prepared by your experienced Thai chef. Either side of this majestic space sit two family rooms radiating relaxation and peace.

Providing you with total flexibility the villa’s six delightful bedrooms are split between two graceful pavilions. Decorated in muted tones and enhanced with rich local wood they exude a high level of luxury. Your spacious, welcoming beds are adorned with soft, clean linen. Your en-suite bathrooms open out on to private gardens brimming with fragrant plants and lush trees. Each room is fully air-conditioned to temper the heat and humidity of Thai days and nights.

From Shanti’s glorious beachfront you have close to 90 meters of silvery sand at your disposal. In this quiet, exclusive neighborhood you’ll be undisturbed by crowds and can bathe and wander to your heart’s content. But you also have the opportunity to explore the wondrous Phang Nga Bay. Charter a boat and you can marvel at the world-famous limestone pinnacles which rise from the sea. Towering among them is the far from secret attraction of James Bond Island.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Featured in The Great Homes of the World section of The New York Times, Villa Fah Sai (meaning “majestic retreat overlooking a tranquil sea”) is an ocean-front home that evokes an idyllic balance between the contemporary grandeur of Frank Lloyd Wright (the famous American architect) and Thai-Japanese timelessness. The front entrance welcomes you into a stretched living room with a view that seduces the eye over an onyx-tiled reflecting pond onto a picturesque panoramic view of the Andaman Sea and Patong Bay.

The large double doors of the first level open onto an elegant veranda that welcomes you to a floor that exudes an airy, modern atmosphere with a junior master suite and three additional en-suite bedrooms, one of which may be converted into a spa. The floor also has a games room, fully equipped with a games console, card table and treadmill. Each of these rooms opens onto an expansive travertine pool deck, the perfect place to congregate for sunset cocktails or midnight dips in the fresh water pool. There’s also an indoor jetted tub so you can treat yourself to a luxurious soak without having to leave the comfort of the villa.

Walking through the living room, you will pass a dining room that comfortably accommodates a dinner party of 10 and enter into a spacious contemporary kitchen equipped with restaurant quality appliances and a breakfast nook. The gourmet kitchen opens out onto a large terrace, ideal for casual dining and entertainment, and offers an unbelievable unobstructed 180º view of Patong Bay, with its majestic mountains and charming coastline.

The master suite is located off the living room and also incorporates the stunning ocean vista. It provides you with 1500 square feet of luxurious privacy, complete with modern western comforts, including a spacious walk-in closet, private retreat and office. There are four additional en-suite bedrooms all with air conditioning and pristine ocean vistas. There’s no better sight when you wake up in the morning.

There are beaches to the north and south of Fah Sai at Samsara within a 10-20 minute stroll. Within a 10 minute drive of this incredible vacation home you’ll find Kamala Town, an array of restaurants, as well as a gym and grocery store. Included in the cost are round-trip airport transfers if you don’t plan on renting your own vehicle during your stay.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

Perched dramatically between 40 to 60 meters above sea level, these oceanfront villas offer spectacular panoramic views to the west and north over the Andaman Sea and Nakalay beach and to the south across Patong Bay.

listing.listing_description:
Let the laid-back vibe of Maenam Beach set the tone for your Koh Samui holiday at Villa Sila. Perched above the beach’s gorgeous golden sands, this vacation rental offers panoramic ocean views, expansive outdoor living areas and a host of luxury amenities. Reserve its seven bedrooms for a tropical getaway with family or a sunny escape with friends.

Your stay at Villa Sila includes the services of a butler, housekeeper, concierge and in-villa chef, who will be happy to prepare dishes from the villa’s menu, as well as a full breakfast. It also includes a massage for each guest over 16, perhaps best enjoyed at the outdoor massage area. Once you’re fully relaxed, keep the feeling going by the infinity pool, al-fresco lounging and dining areas, and outdoor kitchenette, or in the indoor home theater.

A slide-away glass wall connects the villa’s outdoor living areas with its wood-paneled, high-ceilinged great room. A generous table and plenty of seating make it a welcoming space to unwind or watch the sea outside, and a tea- and coffee-making area invites you to stay for a while. There’s also a kitchen with a gas stove, oven, microwave and dishwasher.

Villa Sila has five bedrooms with king beds and two bedrooms with two twin beds each. Many of the bedrooms have honeymoon-suite-worthy features such as al-fresco showers and jetted tubs, and all seven have private en-suite bathrooms. Larger parties can use an additional bedroom with three bunk beds plus a twin bed, or reserve nearby Villa Wayu, which has seven bedrooms of its own.

From the villa’s location on Maenam Beach, it’s a 5-minute drive to the tennis courts and golf course at the nearby Santiburi Resort, as well as the nearest restaurants and grocery store. For a taste of local specialties or to browse for the perfect souvenir, make the 10-minute drive to the outdoor market at Fisherman’s Village in Bophut.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Acting more like a boutique resort, this ultra-luxurious, compound-style six bedroom has a lengthy list of amenities, including two infinity pools, numerous games and water sports equipment, and beautiful beachfront. Villa Saanti comes with a housekeeper, service staff, and private chef to help make your stay as relaxing as possible. The villa is located on the beachfront of Natai in Phang Nga, less than an hour from the bustling city of Phuket.

Inside, Villa Saanti is equipped with state of the art electronics, a sauna, an exercise room, spacious lounge areas, and a formal dining space with seating for twelve. The villa’s decor puts a modern-contemporary spin on traditional Thai design, creating a space that is both relaxing, yet formal enough for the most important of occasions. Each of Saanti’s six bedrooms features a king-sized bed, a lavishly equipped en-suite, and direct access to a private outdoor area.

Outside, you’ll love dining alfresco, and preparing meals in the outdoor kitchen, complete with a wood-burning pizza oven. After dinner, challenge a friend to a game of table tennis, pool, or stroll down to the beach and go kayaking, surfing, or try your luck at fishing; everything you’ll need is supplied. If you’d prefer something more laid-back, mix up your favorite cocktail and enjoy the ocean view from the hot tub, beachside sala, or one of the spacious outdoor living areas.

After you’ve spent a day or two enjoying your own slice of Natai Beach, venture down the coast to Phuket to immerse yourself in exciting Thai culture. On the way down, stop in Phuket’s Old Town area for an afternoon of shopping, museum tours, and delicious Thai cuisine. At night, Bangla Road is the island’s nightlife capital, with vibrant streets lined with dance clubs, bars, and other exciting attractions. And, if there’s a golfer in your group, visit Red Mountain Golf Club and enjoy a round on one of Asia’s top courses.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Step beyond Villa Waterlily’s back gate, and you’ll land on the soft, sandy shore of Thailand’s Maenam Beach. With instant beachfront access, this private five-bedroom is the perfect host for your next incredible beach getaway. Villa Waterlily is secluded, yet conveniently located beach oasis decorated with vibrant lawns, palm trees, and a pristine saltwater swimming pool. Nearby, you’ll find plenty of water sports activities, golf, dining options, and historic sites.

Rich wood tones, wide openings to the terrace, and high-vaulted ceilings give Waterlily a spacious, earthy ambiance that is sure to melt any travel related stresses away in an instant. You’ll hear the sound of waves gently washing over the white sand, feel the warm sun and fresh ocean breeze flowing through the open concept interior, and appreciate the private atmosphere that Waterlily’s lush greenery provides. In the living room, high-end electronics and designer furniture provide the comforts of home, while in the kitchen, a Thai chef provides your daily meals. In the evening, enjoy incredible sunsets from the terrace. Or for a closer look, arrange a beachfront picnic, with cocktails to follow.

If you’re feeling adventurous, your beachfront area comes with the use of kayaks, snorkeling, and other water sports equipment, great for exploring Samui’s beautiful coast. After a day on the beach, rinse off in the fresco shower, pick your favorite lounge chair under the sala, and unwind before dinner. After you’ve eaten, turn on the outdoor speakers and enjoy another incredible night by the ocean.

During your stay, Miskawaan Resort’s managers can help arrange a wide variety of on, and off-site activities, like Thai cooking classes, Muay Thai instruction, diving and snorkeling trips, and private yacht charters. If you’re a golf aficionado, Santiburi Country Club is the island’s best course, as well as a regular stop on the PGA Tour. And, for a taste of the local cuisine, head to the Maenam Walking Market, just around the corner from Maenam Chinese Temple, for nightly festivities.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Reconnect with your family on a dreamy getaway at Samujana Twenty-Six. One of the contemporary homes on the exclusive Samujana estate, this luxury Koh Samui vacation rental has five bedrooms, two kitchens and a layout designed for entertaining. Spend your holiday lounging by the pool, enjoying sunset views from the villa or exploring this magical island together.

Built into the hillside above Plai Laem, the villa opens to an expansive terrace and infinity pool that stretch toward the ocean and surrounding smaller islands. After a swim, stretch out on one of the loungers or daybeds, start a game in the garden or retreat to the shade of the home theater or private gym. Southwest exposure puts you in the perfect spot to watch the sunset, and a rooftop terrace is great for stargazing.

Open-plan, open-air living areas showcase the views and invite the ocean breeze into every corner of the home. The sunken living room, dining table for ten and one of the fully equipped kitchens feel like part of the terrace, and the barbecue gives you the option for a true al-fresco meal. Throughout the living areas, sleek furnishings are paired with weathered wood tables and stone accent walls for a fresh-looking mix of the modern and rustic.

All five bedrooms at Samujana Twenty-Six boast king beds, en-suite bathrooms, lounge areas and private terraces looking out toward the ocean, meaning that everyone gets to sleep in the bedroom with the best view. Full-width sliding glass doors, built-in headboards and accent pieces like mod Swan chairs give the bedrooms a bright yet understated look.

Whether it’s your first time on Koh Samui or you’ve been visiting since your honeymoon, a stay at Samujana will make you fall in love with the island all over again. The estate is just 5 minutes from both quiet, family-friendly Choeng Mon Beach and the bustling oceanfront restaurants and bars of trendy Chaweng Beach. Ask Samujana staff to help you arrange a tee time at one of two nearby golf courses, a scuba or snorkeling expedition or even a yacht charter to take you around the coast.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Contemporary design blends seamlessly into the tropical landscape at Samujana Six. This gorgeous Koh Samui vacation rental features beautifully appointed indoor-outdoor living areas that make it easy to relax, entertain and enjoy the warm weather. The villa’s five bedrooms can accommodate up to ten friends or family members, and luxury amenities help everyone bliss out.

A stay at Samujana begins with an airport transfer and includes breakfast each day. Once you’ve started the morning right, claim one of the loungers or sun beds by the villa’s saltwater infinity pool, keep up with your routine in the fitness area or take in the ocean views from the rooftop terrace. Keep the low-key vibe going with dinner from the barbecue or a quiet evening in the home theater.

The many levels of Samujana Six follow the slope of the hillside and showcase views of the water. The heart of the villa, however, is a stunning open-sided great room with sitting and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen. A sleek sectional, mod lounge chairs, clean-lined dining table and inviting breakfast bar are both stylish and smart.

Everyone in your party will feel indulged by a holiday spent in the villa’s five bedrooms, all of which have king beds, en-suite bathrooms, their own sitting areas and private terraces with ocean views. Sliding glass doors let you open the suites to the terraces, and open-plan layouts mean you can look out at the water from the bathrooms if you’d like.

Samujana is just above the quiet beach of Plai Laem, and 5 minutes from both family-friendly Choeng Mon Beach and lively Chaweng Beach, where you’ll find a beautiful stretch of sand along with oceanfront restaurants and exciting nightlife. If you’re on honeymoon—or wish you were—ask the estate staff to arrange a yacht charter to take you to hidden coves; if you want to stay active, they can assist with booking tee times at local golf courses, fishing excursions and more.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Lotus enjoys a stunning beachfront position within the Miskawaan Estate, a luxury residential hamlet on the north coast of Koh Samui along Maenam and Bangrak beaches. Ideal for families, the villa features about forty meters of beach frontage, an ample private pool, and six superb bedroom suites—including a wonderful hybrid bedroom/games room for kids. With an outstanding private staff including a Thai chef, Villa Lotus offers a superb alternative to the island's popular resorts, allowing you to enjoy this Southeast Asian paradise in comfortable privacy with your loved-ones.

The L-shaped swimming pool forms the heart of the 1,635-square-meter estate, its gorgeous tile bottom depicting the villa's namesake flower. Elegant sun loungers grace the terracotta terrace, inviting you to savor the South Pacific sun, while a beachfront sala welcomes afternoon refreshments in the ocean breeze. Step onto the soft white sand and plunge into the luminous waves before returning to home-catered meals in the ocean-view dining pavilion.

An interior great room runs along the pool terrace and features high, vaulted ceilings, a spacious salon, and a second dining table beneath beautiful pendant lanterns. Throughout the villa, the furnishings and décor offer a fresh and unique interpretation of classic Thai style, including breathtaking original artwork and ceramics.

The master suite opens directly to the pool and a beachfront covered patio with loungers and sunbeds. Its deluxe ensuite bathroom features a dual vanity, jetted bathtub, and both indoor and outdoor showers. All of the guestrooms have ensuite bathrooms and walk-in closets, while the kids' room includes a pool table, fusball table, sitting area, and entertainment system. Bedroom 6 is located upstairs from the kids' room and enjoys a private sun deck.

Miskawaan (meaning "Buddha's garden") offers an enchanting venue for weddings, special occasions, and memorable reunions with family and friends. Your staff can help you plan diverse activities and excursions nearby, including watersports, diving, snorkeling, Muay Thai lessons, yoga, cooking classes, yachting, waterfall zip-lining, and visits to the island's famous temples. Families will love Samui Frisbee Golf, while golf aficionados will enjoy nearby Royal Samui.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Rethink your idea of a vacation rental at Samujana Twenty-Two. Originally designed as two villas, this property has nearly 29,000 square feet of living space, six suite-style bedrooms and outdoor entertaining areas to rival those of any resort. Book this luxury haven on Koh Samui for an idyllic family reunion, corporate event, wellness retreat or even an intimate destination wedding.

Your stay at the exclusive Samujana estate includes breakfast and airport transfers. Unwind in the tropical sunshine on the villa’s terrace, which has an infinity pool stretching toward the ocean, living and dining areas, and plenty of loungers. A private gym, games room and lounge area, and home theater let you keep up with your routine, challenge other guests to a little friendly competition or simply relax after a day of exploring.

An open-sided great room makes the most of a gorgeous location, letting warm breezes waft over the sitting and dining areas and one of two fully equipped kitchens. The furnishings are sleek, modern and perfectly positioned to afford views of the ocean. Weathered wood coffee tables, stone feature walls and polished tile add subtle organic texture to the contemporary space.

Samujana Twenty-Two has five bedrooms with king beds and one with two twin beds; all six have en-suite bathrooms, sitting areas and terraces overlooking the ocean, so that every guest gets to spend their holiday in a room with the best views.

Though it’s tempting to spend your stay ensconced in the villa, there’s something for everyone to see and do on Koh Samui. From the estate’s location near Plai Laem, it’s only 5 minutes to relaxed, family-friendly Choeng Mon Beach and the livelier oceanfront mix of restaurants and bars along Chaweng Beach. Ask Samujana staff for help booking a honeymoon-worthy yacht charter around the island, a thrilling fishing, scuba or snorkeling excursion or an exciting zipline tour.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
If you’re looking for the ultimate island hideaway in a stunning natural setting, L2 Residence ought to be at the top of your list. Built into a lush hillside lot that commands panoramic views over the Gulf of Siam, this luxury Koh Samui vacation rental has slide-open walls, spacious terraces and natural boulders that bring the tropical surroundings into the living spaces. Use the three bedrooms for a quiet family holiday, a relaxed getaway with friends or an indulgent Thailand honeymoon.

Your stay at L2 Residence includes the services of a housekeeper, driver and property manager, and daily continental breakfast is part of the rate. Follow the series of decks and terraces—and the sound of a waterfall—to a deck with a plunge pool, daybeds and umbrellas. After taking a dip, take in the ocean views from a choice of lounge areas on the decks, or pour a drink from the wet bar adjacent to the al-fresco barbecue and dining area. In the evenings, serve drinks from the indoor bar, set the mood with the Sonos wireless sound system or watch a favorite on the projection screen.

The living spaces at L2 Residence follow the natural slope of the hillside, inviting you to move toward the water as you descend through the house. Throughout the villa, you’ll find floor-to-ceiling glass walls that can be pushed back to let warm breezes flow through casual, contemporary spaces filled with pieces like a streamlined purple sofa, plush area rug, organic wooden accent tables and brightly colored accent pillows. The airy dining room is open on two sides and features playful zebra artwork on a third wall, and the chic, minimalist kitchen has a convenient breakfast bar.

Each of the three bedrooms at L2 Residence is an intimate haven with an en-suite bathroom and a furnished private balcony. The master suite has a king bed, lounge area and views of the Gulf of Siam, and the other two bedrooms each have queen beds.

From the beach and spa to local sights, there’s plenty to see and do near the villa’s Laem Set location on the tranquil southwest coast of Koh Samui. Ask your driver to take you to Kamalaya Wellness Sanctuary for a day of pampering, to Lamai Beach for shopping, dining and nightlife, or to Five Islands at Taling Ngam for an unforgettable seafood dinner with equally impressive views. When your tropical idyll comes to an end, plan on a 25 km trip from the villa to Samui Airport.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa 2 is one of three stunning villas that make up the impressive Sangsuri Estate on Koh Samui. This capacious villa is designed as a series of enchanting, stand-alone living pavilions spread through beautifully landscaped grounds, overlooking a quiet stretch of beach north of Chaweng. Guests will be truly immersed in the richness of the tropical setting while cushioned in sophisticated modern luxury.

The poolside lounge is the perfect space to get immersed in a book, with your favorite tunes piped through the villa’s built-in speakers, or to recline on a daybed in front of a movie on the cinema screen. More active souls will love the villa’s two inviting ocean view swimming pools, while a huge beachside Jacuzzi makes regular dips irresistible. Mealtimes are also a memorable private pleasure, with a choice of alfresco dining spaces in which to enjoy succulent dishes prepared by the villa’s private chef.

The villa strikes a perfect balance between modern, ultra-stylish architectural designs and natural elegance, drawing on the striking beauty of the location. The lounge area is furnished with a cushioned sofa and day bed, and the kitchen features a central island breakfast bar protected from the elements. The dining pavilion seats up to ten guests and is surrounded on three sides by wooden shutters that rotate to draw in the soothing ocean views.

The master suite opens onto a private terrace to the rear, featuring a huge outdoor bathtub and a secluded sun terrace with sun beds overlooking the beach. From the upper level bedrooms, steps made of Balinese stone descend around an old tree to expansive planted areas, backed by an attractive, planted wall. With eight bedrooms, Villa 2 at Sangsuri Estate can accommodate up to sixteen guests.

The unique layout and designs at Sangsuri Estate’s Villa 2 effortlessly bring together nature and contemporary luxury, allowing guests to spend the majority of their time outdoors enjoying the stunning vistas and soothing tropical surroundings. Spend your day swimming and sunbathing, then return for evening cocktails, followed by a barbeque, or relaxing in the lounge with a movie on the projector screen. Take a stroll down the beach and be rewarded with a close up view of the nearby, uninhabited island of Koh Matlang. Let Sangsuri Estate become your oasis!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The ideal spot for entertaining large groups, twenty-four is the biggest and most amenity filled villa in the Samujana development. Indoor and outdoor areas are spacious enough for a large amount of guests, merging seamlessly in an open concept design. Perfect for the sunrise and sunset, views from the terrace look out to the south and west over the Gulf of Thailand and all eight of the bedrooms have an amazing ocean view.

With numerous outdoor living and dining spaces, an infinity pool and hot tub, garden, and an outdoor kitchen, the terrace is the hot spot for hosting. Moving inside, guests will enjoy formal dining for fourteen, a games room, cinema room, and an entertainment lounge with a pool table. If you’re feeling like keeping up your daily routines, there is an office and a fitness area. Breakfast, airport transfer, twenty-four hour security, and daily housekeeping are all included as well.

Floor to ceiling windows, large openings to the terrace, and simplistic decorations let the natural beauty of the ocean environment fully immerse the indoor living space. Subtle wood and stone accents give hints of traditional Thai building materials, while contemporary design provides the luxurious comforts of a high end vacation rental. Whether you’re chatting with friends over a glass of wine, lounging by the pool, or curled up for a movie, the options for social spaces are endless.

Each of the eight bedrooms at twenty-four are identical in their features, and they all have a fantastic ocean view. King sized beds, lounge areas, safes, and private terraces make each bedroom a master. As well, they all have their own ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone rain showers, bathtubs, and bidets.

Within minutes from the villa you will find numerous beaches, scenic golf courses and country clubs, and the absolutely amazing Ko Samui Rainforest. And if you feel like a trip into the city, take a stroll down main street for fine dining, boutique shops, and exciting nightlife.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
“Contemporary design with natural elegance"

Villa Kohia has been specifically conceived and built to provide rental guests with all the comfort and convenience of a modern home, but in a stunning tropical setting. The villa offers a range of first class facilities and amenities in a dramatic, oceanview location that truly makes the most of Koh Samui's unique natural surroundings.

The 4-bedroom , multi-level property boasts spacious living spaces with Asian influenced interiors and rich furnishings that combine natural materials with a modern design scheme and leading-edge technology. Outside, the villa is framed in lush foliage with a dramatic seaview pool, wide sun terraces and shaded relaxation and dining areas.

Ideal for a private family holiday, for couples or a group of friends sharing the property, Villa Kohia’s generous communal facilities, wide balconies and luxurious bedrooms mean there’s plenty of space for everyone to relax in peace and take in the stunning island views that provide a constant backdrop to the stay.

Although perched high in the lush Samui hills, the villa is also within easy reach of the beach, and equally close to the island’s famous shopping, dining and entertainment options. This combination of exclusivity, tranquillity and convenience is a rare combination in a popular holiday destination like Koh Samui, especially at such affordable rates.

The Villa

Villa Kohia’s generous bedrooms and spacious living, dining and relaxation areas are spread through two buildings, separated by an open-air courtyard furnished with outdoor sofas and armchairs. All the rooms are served by steps that lead from the villa’s entrance down the side of the house to a large, lower level sun terrace, 12-metre private pool and cushioned, seaview relaxation sala.

The rear building houses Villa Kohia’s 4 double bedrooms, three of them located side-by-side on the upper floor and connected by a wide, covered and furnished terrace. The master occupies the end unit and offers its guests additional private space, stunning sea views plus a 42" TV and a bathtub in the ensuite. The two remaining guest bedrooms also feature ensuites with combination in- and outdoor bathrooms and rainshowers. The lower floor double bedroom folds open directly onto the villa’s inner courtyard and also includes a mezzanine level library and connecting bathroom. 

On the ocean facing side, the courtyard connects to a spacious lounge, dining area and fitted kitchen with breakfast bar that occupies the upper floor of the villa’s second building. This bright, airy living space slides open onto the dramatic ocean vistas and cooling sea breezes. The room is furnished with sink-into sofas and armchairs poised in front of a 42” flat screen plasma TV and a stylish wooden dining table seats 8 comfortably, while standing lamps and Asian artefacts add a sense of homely sophistication.

Villa Kohia’s unique lower level poolside lounge and terrace offer the perfect place to spend lazy days and evenings soaking up the Samui sun, sea breezes and stunning views in peaceful, cushioned comfort. Oversized loungers provide an appealing place to recline and catch the rays, while an equally indulgent relaxation sala offers shaded retreat. The villa’s second expansive living and dining area fills the poolside space beneath the upper floor lounge. This area is furnished with a large sofa, coffee table and another 8- seater dining table and chairs, perfect for al fresco meals.

Staying at Villa Kohia

Villa Kohia offers couples, families or groups of friends an idyllic private island retreat. The spacious, practical layouts and fold-open room designs means guests can easily drift between the living spaces, poolside areas and bedrooms, constantly bathed in stunning ocean views. The villa’s multiple outdoor spaces also encourage guests to make the most of the tropical location, whether reclining in comfort between cooling dips in the pool, sharing a delicious meal with family and friends around one of the impressive dining tables or enjoying a relaxed evening in front of a movie in the upper floor lounge. The villa’s well trained staff take care of details and requests, and the manager is also happy to arrange for a private chef (charged to guests' account). Despite its secluded location, the villa's sophisticated interiors and entertainment systems mean every holiday pleasure is close to hand. There’s also a range of appealing island attractions and activities within easy reach by car.

Location

Villa Kohia sits on a lush hillside around 5 minutes' drive from the main Samui Ring Road at Chaweng, making the villa a perfect base for beach trips and island activities. From there, a short drive takes you straight to the island's most popular bustling beachside strip, while the airport is only 15 minutes to the north, as are the popular beach bars and bistros in Bophut’s famous Fisherman's Village. The villa's location and design allow guests to combine peaceful, exclusive relaxation with more active island pursuits.

listing.listing_description:
Take a blissful break from real life at The Headland Villa 4. Part of the exclusive Headland near Baan Taling Ngam, this airy Koh Samui vacation rental is set on one of the island’s quieter coasts—yet still close to picturesque beaches and lively towns. Reserve its two bedrooms for a getaway with close family only or a tropical honeymoon, or book with one of the other villas for a holiday with a larger group.

Your stay at The Headland Villa 4 includes daily continental breakfast, as well as the services of a concierge, villa manager and housekeeper. Take in views of the island’s more secluded side and the azure sea from outdoor living areas with a lap pool and lounging and dining furniture. After sunset, pour a glass from the in-villa wine selection and settle in by the satellite television or Wi-Fi.

The villa is designed to be both charming and practical, with a traditional thatched roof and modern fold-away glass walls. An open-plan great room with living and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen looks out over the pool terrace to the sea. The mezzanine level over the great room is the ideal spot for kids to watch television or for grown-ups to spend a quiet moment reading.

This luxury property has one bedroom with a king bed and one bedroom with two twin beds; both have private en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning. Like the great room, the bedrooms feature contemporary furnishings and fold-away glass walls for a look that’s both breezy and sophisticated.

The Headland Villa 4 is just a short walk from a rocky beach and a short drive from the sandy, swimmable Lamai Beach. It’s also close to Baan Sabai Resort and Spa, the ferry port and the famed Five Islands restaurant. Don’t miss the chance to explore the bustling town of Nathon, a 11 km drive from the villa, where you’ll find shops selling local products and eateries dishing out local specialties.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Note: This villa can be rented in conjunction with other villas

listing.listing_description:
Located minutes from Trisara Resort’s private beach club, this luxurious three-bedroom will make your next Luxury Retreats beach getaway a breeze. Situated on the oceanside hills of Phuket, this modern rental captures spectacular ocean views and incredible sunsets from its private perch. Nearby, you’ll find plenty more beachfront areas to explore along Phuket’s pristine coast. There are numerous towns and fishing villages in the area, rich with historical sites, adventure tourism, and delicious Thai cuisine, all yours to discover on your next Luxury Retreats beach vacation.

From the exterior, waterfalls, lush gardens, and ocean views decorate the Ocean Residence. Wide openings along the terrace invite Phuket’s natural beauty to seamlessly flow within the interior spaces, enhancing the social, open concept atmosphere. All three en-suite bedrooms feature king-sized beds. The two masters have private balconies and amazing ocean views, while the third comes with direct access to the terrace and a refreshing garden view.

During your stay, you’ll have access to Trisara Resort’s boutiques, golf course, bar, tennis, and fitness facilities. There’s also plenty of weekly events to check out on Trisara’s schedule. Inside, features like Wi-Fi, television, and air conditioning will keep you cool and connected. On the terrace, you’ll love the swimming pools, generous lounge areas, barbecue, and alfresco dining.

After you’ve spent some time enjoying the sand and surf at Trisara’s private beach, venture off resort to experience some of the most popular beach areas among Phuket locals, like Naithon Beach, just a few minutes from home. Naithon’s white sand and crystal waters provide the setting for vibrant beach fun with plenty to see and do in the surrounding area. If you’re in the mood for a more laid back beach trip, Dream Beach Club may be the perfect place for you. If there’s a golfer in your group, Laguna Phuket Golf Club is a course with incredibly scenic views and lush, challenging fairways. And, if you’re in the mood to shop, The Boat Avenue Mall is just nine kilometers from Trisara.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Malouna lies along tranquil Laem Noi Beach on the northern shore of Koh Samui in Thailand. About 150 feet of pristine beachfront, opulent vegetation and breathtaking views make this exceptional setting ideal for a family holiday or a special celebration like a wedding or anniversary. Just a short swim or kayak ride from the beach lies a colorful coral reef, perfect for snorkelers, while at dawn, you can watch the local fishermen quietly lay their nets for the day’s catch.

After passing through Villa Malouna’s oversized wooden doors into its secluded tropical garden with frangipanis and birds of paradise, you will find the heart of the villa, a ninety foot infinity swimming pool adorned with emerald green Sukabumi stones. Perfect for laps or relaxing dips, the pool also has a shallow area for children. A wide wooden deck, made of sustainable wood from the Netherlands, has been equipped with welcoming silver-grey beanbags and offers guests a voluptuous setting for reading or taking a nap.

The architecture of this vacation rental has been conceived in synergy with the island’s natural surroundings, lush vegetation and lagoon views. Inspired by Zen and mid-century modern architecture, the villa is contemporary yet authentic. The open plan design makes the most of the island’s cool breezes and light. A stunning black open kitchen features Tom Dixon copper lighting and a solid wood dining table. The black kitchen is used for breakfasts and serving, while another service kitchen lies in the staff area for more elaborate dishes. With the in-house chef, exclusive culinary experiences include improvised picnics on the beach, a romantic dinner or a beach barbeque.

The six bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms are located in three separate bedroom pavilions. Each bedroom has a modern and spacious black terrazzo bathroom with rain shower that open to a private back garden. All bedrooms are minimalistic to create a serene and relaxing atmosphere. The bunk room is sure to be a hit with children!

The villa manager will handle your special requests for candle lit dinners, yoga sessions and excursions. Of course, there is always the option of enjoying a drink under a parasol on the powdery sand beach just footsteps away. A perfect oceanfront oasis with luxury services, tailor-made activities and modern architecture, Villa Malouna invites you for the vacation you deserve!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Ban Makkala is a beachfront villa on the pristine southern shore of Koh Samui, near the famous temple of Laem Sor. With unobstructed, panoramic views of the Gulf of Thailand, the villa offers an enchanting setting for experiencing the precious beauty of this renowned island. Resort-worthy features include an expansive infinity swimming pool, an exquisite sunken dining pavilion and a well-appointed home theater, while the villa's wonderful staff includes twice-daily housekeeping and a personal Thai chef. Ideal for multiple families or destination wedding guests, the villa features six king bedrooms including two master suites.

The villa's pavilions are arrayed around the pool and inner courtyard garden, providing a sense of cloistered sanctuary on the edge of the vast ocean. The extraordinary, T-shaped pool runs along the villa and the shore, allowing you to bathe in its soothing waters while gazing on the shimmering sea. Embark in the villa's kayak onto the Gulf of Thailand or plunge into its crystalline water, and return to alfresco meals in the enchanting sala. Bask in the sunlight on elegant lounge chairs or savor a siesta in the beach-side hammock strung between palms.

A lovely stone path connects the sala with the main pavilion, where a cavernous great room on the upper floor opens to an expansive, ocean-facing balcony. This central living area offers an open-concept layout with a television salon, large dining table, and gourmet kitchen with wet bar—ideal for festive gatherings with family and friends.

Each bedroom offers a dreamy private haven for couples or individuals to enjoy downtime and rest, complete with king bed, entertainment system, air conditioning, and an ensuite bathroom with shower and tub. Doors to the terrace allow you to step from your bed in the morning for a refreshing plunge in the pool or sea.

Largely untrammeled by tourists, the southern coast of Koh Samui is ideal for travelers seeking an undiluted experience of Koh Samui's natural beauty and spiritual culture. A visit to the iconic Laem Sor Pagoda, just down the beach, offers an authentic view of local religious pedigree and practices. The villa is about 10 km from town and an easy drive to Royal Samui Golf Course, numerous world-class beaches, and family-friendly activities.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
